item.title: 【HD Live Performances】HDTV - Madonna - The Confessions Tour - 2007- Full HD 1080p DTS 2.0 /DTS 5.1 (UNCUT)
item.description:
This is an uncut version of the Confessions Tour delivered in 1080p quality. As you probably know the complete tour was never released in an HD format, only the censured TV-cut 1:30h version was broadcasted on some networks, the full version of the show can only be watched in the DVD-release, so this torrent aims to bring the best of both worlds, the NBC HDTV feed is used during most of the scenes, while the cut sections of the show use upscaled images recovered from the Confessions DVD-release.

All credits to: lss1995
